host.label: Management IP address or Hostname
host.description: Specify the IP address or  hostname of the data source so that IBM Cloud Pak for Security can communicate with it

port.label: Host Port
port.description: Set the port number that is associated with the Host name or IP

help.label: Help
help.description: More details on the datasource setting can be found in the specified link

selfSignedCert.label: IBM QRadar Certificate
selfSignedCert.description: Use self-signed SSL certificate for QRadar V7.3.1 and CA content(root and intermediate) for QRadar V7.3.2

sni.label: Server Name Indicator
sni.description: The Server Name Indicator (SNI) enables a separate hostname to be provided for SSL authentication

sec.label: Authentication Token
sec.description: The Authentication Token is the unique identifier of the data source that you want to establish the connection with. It is required to authenticate the connection request.
